name: GHOST NAME said 3 times when first entering map
ENTERING VAN only 2 times unless leaving map
EVIDENCE items can't include EMF Reader or Thermometer
LEAVE WITH 2 of any carryable item from house
SANITY dropped by spending 2 minutes in the dark before starting map
TAKE PHOTO of a Ghost Event (Interaction)
GHOST TRIGGERS sink (Dirty Water) or breaker
LOCATE GHOST with Sensors (Motion and Sound) only
GHOST NAME said 3 times in bathroom before leaving map
SANITY Pills must all be thrown into the ghost room
EVIDENCE items unlocked alphabetically by each labelled photo taken
TAKE PHOTO of the EMF Reader with a reading of 2 or greater
